location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding vouchers (not present), which were omitted from the cash accounts from the quarter ending 31 October 1824, along with one bill and receipt (also not present) for presents purchased at Shiraz.
